properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 7 at 1:59AM PST until January 8 at 6:45AM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Seattle has issued a flood warning
for the following rivers in Washington...

Stillaguamish River At Arlington affecting Snohomish County
Skykomish River Near Skykomish River near Gold Bar affecting
Snohomish County

Heavy rain over the central Cascades will continue until the
cold front moves through the area this evening.

The National Weather Service in Seattle has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Skykomish River Near Skykomish River near Gold Bar
* from this morning to Wednesday morning.
* At  1:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 14.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage around 7 AM
Tuesday and crest near 15.4 feet around 10 AM Tuesday. The river
will fall below flood stage this evening.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet, the Skykomish River will cause minor flooding
of low pasture lands and low lying roads...including Index-Galena
Rd and Tualco Loop Rd.  A stage of 15 feet on the Skykomish River
corresponds to a Phase 2 in the Snohomish County flood program.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars...vans...or trucks through flooded areas...this is
the cause of most flood related deaths in Washington. Be alert for
rapid changes and monitor developments by listening to NOAA Weather
radio or other local media.
